attributes.action: to reinstate the use of capital punishment and bring back respect to the police force
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prisons are full, and people are not caring what the police says or does, perhaps its time instead of rehabilitation, but instead put in the largest deterrent of all, hanging. when murderers are getting 8 years, it doesnt sound like justice, those who take away life should forfeit the right to live theirs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
